name: Stealth Man
description:
Shadow Man is the latest and greatest 3D stealth game, where the player must, travel through the level avoiding enemies and detection to solve puzzles and reach the goal. The game features robust graphics and intuitive, addictive gameplay to keep players hooked and wanting more.

Controls:

- Movement: WASD

- Run: LEFT-SHIFT

- Crouch: LEFT- CTLR

- Interact: E
